is-on-https.title: The website does not use secure HTTPS
is-on-https.description: Your website is insecure. This scares off clients and Google penalizes you heavily.

meta-description.title: Meta Description missing
meta-description.description: Google doesn't know what your site is about. You need a compelling summary to appear in results.

document-title.title: Page lacks a title
document-title.description: The title is the most important element for SEO. Without it, you are invisible.

server-response-time.title: Server is too slow
server-response-time.description: Initial response time is high. Consider switching hosting or optimizing the backend.

render-blocking-resources.title: Render-blocking resources
render-blocking-resources.description: There is CSS or JS preventing the website from displaying quickly.

uses-optimized-images.title: Unoptimized images
uses-optimized-images.description: Images are too heavy. Use modern formats like WebP.

largest-contentful-paint.title: Slow loading (LCP)
largest-contentful-paint.description: The largest element takes too long to appear. This frustrates users.

cumulative-layout-shift.title: Unexpected movement (CLS)
cumulative-layout-shift.description: The website 'shifts' while loading, causing erroneous clicks.

ribotflow.description: "All-in-One" management platform unifying CRM, invoicing, and social media. Eliminates the chaos of scattered information and uses AI to draft emails and manage opportunities.

salutflow.description: Create your own Web App (PWA) in minutes without coding. Manage bookings, recurring payments (Stripe), and capacity automatically. Ideal for gyms and studios.

triatu.description: A smart application that fights food waste by generating unique recipes based on the ingredients the user already has, using advanced AI and fun decision modes.

common.transparency_desc: Transparency is our priority. Here is all the legal information about who we are and the rules of this website.

avis_legal.title: Legal Notice
avis_legal.section1_desc: In compliance with Law 34/2002 (LSSI-CE), we inform you that the owner of the website is:
avis_legal.section2_p1: Access to this website is free and open. Simple access does not imply the establishment of any commercial relationship between DigitAI Studios and the user.
avis_legal.section2_p2: The user agrees to use the website in accordance with the law and this Legal Notice, abstaining from using it for illicit purposes or purposes that may damage the interests of third parties.
avis_legal.section3_quote: All contents (brands, logos, texts, photographs, icons, images, etc.), as well as the graphic design, source code, and software, are the exclusive property of DigitAI Studios or third parties who have authorized their use, being protected by national and international legislation.
avis_legal.section4_p1: DigitAI Studios is not responsible for:
avis_legal.section4_list_1: Possible security failures that may occur or possible damage to the user's computer system (viruses, malware, etc.).
avis_legal.section4_list_2: Information and content stored in forums, social networks, or any other medium that allows third parties to publish content independently.
avis_legal.section4_list_3: The exact accuracy of automatic audits, which are indicative and based on the Google Lighthouse API.
avis_legal.section5_p1: For the resolution of all disputes related to this website, Spanish legislation will apply, to which the parties expressly submit, with the Courts and Tribunals of the city of Girona being competent for the resolution of all conflicts.

privacitat.title: Privacy Policy
privacitat.subtitle: Your privacy is sacred. Here we clearly explain what data we collect, why, and how we protect it.
privacitat.section1_title: 1. Who is responsible for your data?
privacitat.section1_text: The responsible party is DigitAI Studios (see Legal Notice for full details). You can contact our Data Protection Officer at: info@digitaistudios.com.
privacitat.section2_desc: We only collect data strictly necessary to offer our services:
privacitat.data_audit_desc: The URL of the website you want to analyze and your email to send you the report.
privacitat.data_account_desc: Your name, email, and encrypted password when you register on the Dashboard.
privacitat.section3_title: 3. Who do we share data with?
privacitat.section3_desc: We do not sell your data to anyone. We only share it with technological providers necessary for the service operation:
privacitat.provider_supabase: Supabase: Database and authentication (Hosted in the EU/AWS).
privacitat.provider_google: Google Cloud: API to process web audits.
privacitat.section4_p1: You have full control over your data. At any time you can:
privacitat.rights_list_1: Access, rectify, or delete your data.
privacitat.rights_contact: To exercise them, send an email to info@digitaistudios.com.

cookies.title: Cookie Policy
cookies.subtitle: We use cookies to ensure the website works correctly and to understand how we can improve it. Here are all the details.
cookies.section1_quote: A cookie is a small text file stored in your browser when you visit almost any website. Its utility is for the website to remember your visit when you return to browse that page, or keep your session open.
cookies.section2_p1: This website uses the following types of cookies:
cookies.tech_desc: They are essential for the website's functioning. Without them, you could not log in or browse correctly.
cookies.analytics_desc: They allow us to quantify the number of users and analyze their use of the service to improve it.
cookies.analytics_1: Proprietary Analytics: Anonymous statistics respectful of privacy (without invasive Google tracking).
cookies.section3_p1: You can allow, block, or delete cookies installed on your computer by configuring your browser options:
